messages.msgSnippet: Ren, Thanks so much! I m off to Zainy Brainy today for their sale. ;-) Barb E The function of the child is to live his own life - not the life that his
messages.messageBody:
Ren,
Thanks so much! I'm off to Zainy Brainy today for their sale. ;-)


Barb E
"The function of the child is to live his own life - not the life that his
anxious parents think he should live."
A S Neill

> In a message dated 11/21/02 9:54:37 AM Central Standard Time,

> << Ren, Do you have the game, booster packs, or tin? Maybe all three? >>
>

> both said they'd recommend the tin to start with, it's better.
> More cards and all....
> They both want one for Christmas!
> The Gameboy Advance game they have is "Eternal Duelist Soul" and Trevor LOVES
> it!
>
> Ren

messages.subject: Yugioh
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/21/02 9:54:37 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/21/02 9:54:37 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Ren, Do you have the game, booster packs, or tin? Maybe all three? >>

The boys started out with a starter deck and have been buying boosters. They
both said they'd recommend the tin to start with, it's better.
More cards and all....
They both want one for Christmas!
The Gameboy Advance game they have is "Eternal Duelist Soul" and Trevor LOVES
it!

Ren
"The answers aren't important really...
What's important, is knowing all the questions."
-Zilpha Keatley Snyder
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
